channel.title: Picking up Gluon gun causes whole computer to crash
channel.description:
Bit of a weird one:
When encountering the Gluon gun, picking it up caused my whole computer to freeze. This could be repeated reliably 3-4 times in a row and happened literally just as the gun was picked up.
The odd thing is, I then picked it up by accident (trying to open the door so I could kill the bullsquid) and no crash. Just thought I'd report it though.
Let me know if you need computer info.

item.title: Picking up Gluon gun causes whole computer to crash
item.dc:creator: vktech
item.description:
Post your system specs (CPU, GPU, OS)
I had a similar problem on my crappy laptop, but it depends. Does it show any error when it crashes?

Read full topic
item.source: Picking up Gluon gun causes whole computer to crash
